references.reason: This paper introduces the foundational denoising diffusion probabilistic models (DDPMs), which is a central concept used in this study.
This paper introduces Diffusion Transformers (DiTs), which are the dominant architecture for visual generation tasks and serve as the foundation for DiffMoE.

references.paper_title: Score-based generative modeling through stochastic differential equations
references.reason: This paper introduces score-based generative modeling and stochastic differential equations, an important framework for generative modelling.

references.paper_title: Outrageously large neural networks: The sparsely-gated mixture-of-experts layer
references.reason: This paper is one of the original Mixture-of-Experts (MoE) papers, which is leveraged in this study.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper is another work of latent diffusion models, which is used to make the image generation.
